website_summaries.verdict: A sturdy design for a bath time, caddy-style organizer for kids to access toys in the tub.
pros: Users say that this model is durable, well-made, and saves space
Customers also like that it's adjustable and the removable inserts make it versatile for different toys
It stands out for being a top option for freestanding tubs where hanging types won't work
cons: Tends not to lock in place
some felt it took up too much room

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: I am in love! We had the basic net sack that suctions to the wall and hated it. It didn't stick on one side and our daughter couldn't get the toys out of the bottom. This thing is amazing. It's sturdy so she can grab on it to stand up and sit down, it holds all of her toys plus shampoo, body wash and bubbles. Plus it is easy to take out and sit on the floor if the adults don't want it in the shower while they are. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: monica

customer_reviews.title: Great Toy Storage!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this bath caddy. We have stone walls in the tubs, so we needed something that didn't have to stick to the wall. This has been a perfect fit! It fits plenty of toys, drains really well, and can fit any part of the tub. It IS non-slip, but it's not perfect, so if your baby tries to use it to pull themselves up, they CAN fall - but if you're watching them & you hold it in place it's fine. It's also nice, because it keeps my son from getting too close and hitting his head on the faucet or drain plug. I highly recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Great organizer and toy holder for draining and cleaning bath toys
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was a great way to drain as well as organize my daughters bath toys. The mesh bags and other options seemed like the toys still wouldn’t have much room to dry out. This also is great because it’s like a barrier between my daughter and her access to the bath water and handle. She can stand at it and grab her toys but it keeps her from touching the handle and eventually being able to turn it up hotter. I love that it’s long and has lots of holes to drain all her toys and easy for her to clean up and access them.
customer_reviews.author: Joc24

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit for Clawfoot Tub
customer_reviews.text: The fit is GREAT for my 100 year old claw foot iron tub. I use it to hold shower products. I had purchased many previous ones before and the last one was made of chrome and rusted in no time. The one before that was made of white plastic tubing but that rusted eventually too. Recently I bought another one similar to that but the fit was so poor and it was so cheap it arrived bent and deformed. I gave this 4 stars because it is made of plastic and I suspect it will mildew very soon. But maybe it can be cleaned, right? It does give a sturdy grip to all my products my hubby and I use!
customer_reviews.author: Urbanmuser

customer_reviews.title: Holds a lot of stuff!!!
customer_reviews.text: Holds a lot of toys and fits neatly over the tub, I could never get those toy holders with suction cups to stick on my shower because our tile is textured, so I searched around for a toy holder that would work with our tub and came across this one, I'm so glad I decided to try it. My older daughter's favorite bath toys are barbies and this holds them perfectly because it's long and narrow. The inserts can be removed so there is plenty of room for all her dolls, plus it still holds my baby's water squirters as well!! Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Jemeni143

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Cute, drains well, very convenient for storing toys and my 1 year old likes it because she can reach it and grab the toys out herself. Doesn't slide around and fits well across the tub. Also convenient to hold Mommy's wine glass if I decide to take a bath! I like that it's easy to move around, when we have guests stay and use the shower I just stow it under the sink. The only reason I gave it 4 stars is that it does take up a lot of room so it may become a problem as the baby gets bigger.
customer_reviews.author: ksdenson

customer_reviews.title: Works great in tub with shower doors!
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure one of these would work in my tub, especially after reading mixed reviews of other models...however, I love this thing! We have a shower door and this stays put no problem at all. It hasn't fallen off once with two rowdy kids, nor has it mildewed. I tried the netting/suction cup variety as well, but the toys just never seemed to make it back in the bag after tub time. With this even my 2.5-year-old puts his toys away. Great purchase. For reference, I paid $13.49 in October 2017.
customer_reviews.author: bibliophile42

customer_reviews.title: Finally found what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for a good bathtub caddy for my children to put cups, bowls, etc. in, to play during their bath. This one came with great reviews and I have to say, I can see why. It's made of plastic but the build is durable and sturdy. The caddy rests nicely on the bathtub without any wobbles, etc. which is important when you're needing it to withstand 2 toddlers playing on it. Great product! I'd recommend this to any parent who is looking for less messes to clean up after bath time.
customer_reviews.author: SP

customer_reviews.title: A Staple for Baby Bathtime
customer_reviews.text: Love that it just sits over the current tub and is adjustable lengthwise. The fact that it’s plastic is perfect because it’s easy to clean but also safe in case baby bumps into it. Very convenient for storage and easy to grab items without having to get up/down a bunch of times. Prior to buying this, I just used the shower ledge and bathroom cabinets for toy/soap storage but this is much more convenient because everything is within easy reach
customer_reviews.author: Lea B

customer_reviews.title: Game Changer !!!!
customer_reviews.text: I actually clean & organize homes for other moms/families, one of my clients had this and let me tell you, it's a game changer! So many parents have different solutions to the bath toy scenario, often a small basket on top of the back part of toilet... I was using a stainless steel colander which definitely served it's purpose.... but... to have them all in the bath/shower without compromising floor space or getting scummy is the best! Just wonder why I hadn't done it sooner :)
customer_reviews.author: brian murphy

customer_reviews.title: ALSO a perfect caddy for adults w/o kids!!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this because I have a shower wand so caddies fit poorly. This fits great towards the rear of the shower and holds all of the essentials. My only negative (but it's not enough to take away a star) is that you can't use the separators on both sides. When you slide the connections together, one side is going to be a tad smaller than the other. The smaller side will hold the blue separators well, but the outer side will be too big to hold the other separator. Frankly I could care less about that second separator because my problem of having a shower caddy that always rust and never fits quite right, has been solved.
customer_reviews.author: dr_chandler

customer_reviews.title: Smart purchase
customer_reviews.text: This toy caddy is just what we needed! I was so tired of all the other toy storage products that used suction cups to stick to the wall- they would constantly fall down and eventually stop sticking altogether. This fits perfectly in my bathtub, I like that it's adjustable to accommodate different sized bathtubs. It holds a decent amount of toys and they all drain nicely. We've had this for at least 6 months now, it holds up great!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly F

customer_reviews.title: Easy to adjust and helps organize
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I needed to organized my kid’s growing collection of bath toys. It’s easy to adjust to the correct size when you assemble. I like that it includes two dividers to separate different toys and/or soap, etc. it also includes a soap dish. Hopefully it will be easy to keep clean and prevent mold/mildew.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper1984

customer_reviews.title: Just what we needed!
customer_reviews.text: I was worried that it wouldn’t sit right in my bath tub but it worked out fine! Holds all of my sons bath toys and is just very useful to have. Every parent needs to get this for their kids. I haven’t cleaned it yet but it looks very easy to do since it’s hard plastic with lots of holes for drainage.
customer_reviews.author: Addison

customer_reviews.title: Great tub toy storage, adjustable length, stays clean
customer_reviews.text: We have tried several tub toy storage containers and this is my favorite. I love that it doesn’t require a suction cup (those never hold well). Also so easy that the length is adjustable so it will fit any tub. EIt also has holes so the water drains out and it doesn’t aquire mildew very quickly. I’d say the dividers and soap holder are nice features, but not really necessary. My 2 year old likes to pull them /off.
customer_reviews.author: NLopie

customer_reviews.title: This is definitely the cutest and best alternative to knocking bottles off the edge of the ...
customer_reviews.text: I had a hard time keeping all our bath goodies handy when giving baby a bath in the tub. This has room for body wash, shampoo, rinse cup, and toys! It expands so it fits any size tub, and it comes with dividers you can put anywhere, so you can customize your storage. This is definitely the cutest and best alternative to knocking bottles off the edge of the tub.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and surprisingly sturdy
customer_reviews.text: We have a wonky bathtub with uneven sides, yet this caddy works well thanks to the rubber on the underside of the yellow ducks. Easy to assemble and surprisingly sturdy. I also like that there are drainage holes all over, even where the two white pieces overlap, unlike other caddies out there. We don't use the blue dividers, but they are easy enough to install. It's not enormous, but it holds plenty of toys. Exactly what we needed.
customer_reviews.author: EML

customer_reviews.title: A good idea but too easy for child to throw around
customer_reviews.text: Maybe I didn't get all the parts, but it seems that this product should have come with suction cups or something to keep it adhered to the bathtub. It straddles the side walls well enough, and adjusts in length to accommodate different tub widths, but nothing keeps the basket from being picked up and moved around. Our toddler easily figured that out, and more often than not, she tossed it into the water during her bath. More to the point, she also used it to brace herself as she attempted to stand in the tub, and since it moved around, we had to prevent her from doing this due to the safety hazard.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You'll wonder where has this item been!
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING not sure how or why I didn't get this from the start. Drying the toys daily was becoming a hassle especially when the pile grew. Having them on the side of the tub in a basket or bin wasn't an option for me either. So I decided to give it a try and instantly fell in love. It's sturdy and easy peasy to assemble. Refer to before and after photos. Bye bye to the days of using baby tub as a bin.
customer_reviews.author: J'Marie

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your cash
customer_reviews.text: This is way too flimsy. I fell like every five seconds it’s being knocked over and has to be picked back up again. The corners of my tub are somewhat rounded and because of that too it falls even easier. The holes that drain the water and very sharp, my infant cut his finger on it already. And one of the blue separators already snapped in half
customer_reviews.author: ashlee sandvoss

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly for soap and shampoo bottles
customer_reviews.text: I wanted something other than an over the shower head bottle holder. This caddy is perfect! I am using it in a small standard tub. Right now it is holding nine bath products. In addition to using the included soap dish, I have two bars of soap on either end where the little ducks are, works great....I highly recommend this caddy.
customer_reviews.author: SusanTop Contributor: Cycling

customer_reviews.title: Very functional
customer_reviews.text: I use this to store my daughters bath toys. I like that it's hard plastic and I can add the toys to it, then rinse them with clean hot water while I'm rinsing the tub. Quick and easy. I wanted something that was not toy storage specific and therefore just be thrown away when she no longer was of the age to play with bath toys. This works well for that as it can be a used as a standard bath caddy. We don't use bar soap so that attachment isn't useful for us. And I think the dividers just get in the way. But those are pieces that you can add or remove, so I just took them off.
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I didn't want a mesh toy holder and saw this. It is exactly what we needed. Holds the toys, rinse cup, and body wash. We do not use the bar soap holder on it. This can fit any tub and you can choose how big of sections you want or no sections at all.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Finally my kids keep the water IN the tub
customer_reviews.text: This tray has been awesome in helping my kids keep water in the tub while playing. They like to poor water into containers and from one cup to another, etc... but used to do this on the edge of the bathtub. Now we put the tray across the tub and they can poor all they want since the water falls right back into the tub. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: TwinMom

customer_reviews.title: Convienient and useful caddy!
customer_reviews.text: This caddy is great! I had a suction cup toy bag that hung on the side of the tub with no problems, but as my toddler got more toys, they started getting more challenging to get out of the bag and I noticed that many were still very wet even after 1-2 days in the bag. The caddy ends have a rubber bottom so it stays in place well and everything fits well in it. To get the toys out I just have to tip over the caddy, which is a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: SCScounselor

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for baths with textured tile
customer_reviews.text: We redid our bathroom last year and went with a textured tile on the bath tub enclosure so none of those toy holders that stick to tile would work for us. This is a great caddy to hold and drain the toys, bath books, shampoo, etc. I like the soap dish since it has a hook to hang a luffa and have his bath brush can sit in the holder. It will slide so it is out of the way when I shower in there or to clean the tub.
customer_reviews.author: Amy McBride

customer_reviews.title: I wish I'd tried this first.
customer_reviews.text: I'm so glad I got this! We had one of those suction cup things, but I believe suction cups were designed by an evil villain to slowly drive people crazy! They don't work! It would randomly fall off the wall and I just knew it was only a matter of time before it hit one of my little guys in the head. Anyway, I switched to this and my fears of attacking bath toys has gone away! The boys can reach this much easier to take things out and help me put things away. Also they can bump it, smack it or kick it and it stays put. Not cascade of hard plastic toys!
customer_reviews.author: B. White

customer_reviews.title: Yellow Rubber Duckies on the ends.. Not as shown.
customer_reviews.text: This is not exactly what I received. There are Yellow Rubber Duckies on the ends that grip the bathtub. I got this for myself, a 60 year old woman. Works great for my shampoos and body washes. But rather immature looking. My husband really laughed at me when he thought I ordered this with the Duckies on it. I will keep it because it works for my purposes, but someone needs to check what is being ordered and what is going out the door.
customer_reviews.author: aconcernedconsumer

customer_reviews.title: Get it! It's good!
customer_reviews.text: It's perfect for bath time with my toddler. He can reach his toys easily and it makes it a lot easier for me to clean up afterwards. It took me about 5 minutes to unbox and snap together. It fits in my garden tub and still has more room to expand. It's a great buy for organization, ease of set up, and functionality.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki D.

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant idea for bath toys
customer_reviews.text: This is a great idea--good drainage so toys don't get moldy, and keeps them easy to reach for the child. My favorite thing about it was that it doesn't rely on suction cups. Suction cups never hold for very long, so I was always picking up the bag of toys from a damp heap in the middle of the bathtub. Plus, this has better airflow than most bath toy bags, which keep the toys clustered together in a never-fully-dry clump. It has dividers and a little soap dish, if you want them, but they are easily removed if they are in the way. Can be put in the dishwasher for periodic sanitization.
customer_reviews.author: Fred

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried several toy holders for bathtubs that have the clear suction cups and nothing stays on the tile, they constantly fall and slide down. This, however, is perfect. It has material on the bottom of the two sides that keep it from sliding off, and the basket itself is very easily made smaller or bigger, depending on the size of your tub. I can now take a shower without having to constantly kick toys around.
customer_reviews.author: Kendra

customer_reviews.title: This item is darn perfect. My little dude loves to dig in for ...
customer_reviews.text: This item is darn perfect. My little dude loves to dig in for his toys, it looks great, functions perfectly and looks pretty nice for what it is. I love this thing! My wife and I have tried two other bath toy holders, both suction cup style, and they weren't very good. The suction cups would always cave under the weight or just wouldn't sit right. This product solved that issue. I literally have zero complaints for it. Great price, does exactly what it needs to do and is perfect. Thanks Munchkin!
customer_reviews.author: A. Morris

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect to keep the kids toys contained! I don't use the soap holder or dividers right now but its cool they came with it so I have the option. I love not having to worry about something losing suction! It adjust easy so will fit any tub size!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bath caddy for children's toys and soap
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly to store all things bath...including our pump shampoo!...for my year old daughter. We just leave it in the tub for her, but could be easily stored underneath a sink cabinet or in a closet. Sturdy, easy to clean...definitely a great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: ... kept falling off the wall so I was very happy when I found this caddy that just stays put
customer_reviews.text: Went through quite a few bath toy organizers that kept falling off the wall so I was very happy when I found this caddy that just stays put. It does not hold as many toys as some of the wall organizers but my daughter loves it and she loves playing with the caddy and incorporating it as part of her playtime in the bath. This is a great addition to our tub and keeps all her favorite bath toys within arms reach. Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: NYCityMom

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I love this caddy. It allows my son's bath toys to dry and keeps them from getting moldy. It holds a lot, even his shampoo and body wash to save space elsewhere. This was recommended to me by a coworker, and I am so glad I purchased it instead of the net I originally planned to get.
customer_reviews.author: Kalie S.

customer_reviews.title: Better Than Scoops
customer_reviews.text: Very handy product. I had looked at ones that stick to the wall as scoops and am so glad I went with this caddy. It is adjustable and well made. Fits our tub well and is sturdy. Actually goes very small for storage too. So easy to put the toys in and let them drip dry. As an added bonus my daughter likes to put her toys in and out while she bathes so it's like a whole other toy for her. Only reason I didn't give it 5 stars is the soap dish is hard to attach but that could just be me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and great versatility!
customer_reviews.text: I don’t see how this wouldn’t fit any sized bath tub. It’s so easy to adjust and works so much better than those mesh bags that suction to your tub or shower wall because it’s easy to retrieve any item/toy you want from it without knocking it down. It’s also easy to to just lift it in and out of the tub if you need it temporarily off for any reason.
customer_reviews.author: Kaylie O.

customer_reviews.title: Not sturdy. Does not lock into place
customer_reviews.text: Is not nearly as sturdy as I thought it would be. The dividers fall out all the time. You cannot lock it into the length you want so when my daughter is in the tub and playing with her toys out of it, the caddy shrinks and ends up falling into the tub several tubs. I definitely thought it would be a much sturdier product.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Wood

customer_reviews.title: Great toy/soap/shampoo holder!
customer_reviews.text: This works perfectly. It adjusts to any tub. I’m using it on my oval soaker tub but it would easily fit a standard tub. I’m buying a second holder for our other tub.
customer_reviews.author: SZ

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This fits my claw foot tub perfectly!! It’s sturdy and is not bowing even with the entire tray full of shampoo and body wash! It stays in place great and doesn’t slide around. Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: hunterfamily

customer_reviews.title: It is adjustable
customer_reviews.text: I am not sure did I read an explanation carefully or not, but I didn't see that it is adjustable, so you can adjust it to any tab width. And it is adjustable!! So, don't worry if you have non standard tab, like we have it will fit. It is very durable and nor flimsy at all. I am very pleased with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Iryna

customer_reviews.title: Handy and Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Really like that it’s adjustable in width. Holds ALL of grandkid’s bath toys and sponges. Good air flow helps things dry quickly and prevents mildew & mold from forming.
customer_reviews.author: MJGee

customer_reviews.title: simple and good.
customer_reviews.text: This is simple and good and does the job..its got enough holes to reduce the amount of water that sits in it..it would be nice if the 2 edges didn't cup up water as much but overall its good. Its relatively cheap and makes a good caddy for your little kid to play with his toys.. IE transition from a baby bath into a bathtub..this is a must if he's got toys to distract him while he's in in the bath.
customer_reviews.author: Snuffles

customer_reviews.title: We love this Bath Caddy
customer_reviews.text: We love this Bath Caddy! I'd been using a bag that suctioned to the bathtub wall and I hated it! I had to pick it up every morning after it had fallen and the toys were everywhere. I ordered this to replace it and I absolutely love it! The toys are within easy reach for my kids so we only have to get out a few at a time and this sits at the rear of my tub and I never have to move it! Don't hesitate and just order this caddy!!
customer_reviews.author: Dayna

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: fits the bathtub perfectly and still allows for us to take a shower while the toys are stored in the tub. My 3 year old loves sitting in the tub and viewing his collection of toys before he selects the lucky ones that get to take the plunge Lol......i love that it was easy to install and allows the water to flow right through and the air to circulate around the toys so that they dry quickly. I also like that when the toys are out I can place the soap and other items I need into the rack for easy access.
customer_reviews.author: Donnie Hall

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, cute and doubles as a bath toy!
customer_reviews.text: OK. So I bought this because the toys were taking over the tub, and it is awesome so far! It is sturdy and sits nicely right in front of the faucet. As the kids got into the tub, I realized that not only was this a great storage device, but my son (who is 3 1/2) has also started using it as a bath toy. He pours the water through it and watches the waterfall effect as it goes through the holes. He literally played with it for 30 minutes, and cried when we made him get out of the tub. We're very pleased with the munchkin products. They are often sturdy, cutely colored, and last pretty long.
customer_reviews.author: MG

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Even though dividers shift and fall
customer_reviews.text: Our doesn’t fit this and I still love this thing. I just open it up wider to have it sit on the basket part making it level, vs the handle. Works for me! Great quick storage. The plastic dividers come unsnapped easily. And I ditched the soap tray. And I still love this organizer!
customer_reviews.author: Donald B. Aubertin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Toddler
customer_reviews.text: This fit just like the description on our bathtub. We had a small ledge on one side, and it fits just fine. It just sits on top of the tub (no suction cups) but doesnt seem to slide or move while playing in the tub. It fits all of the bath toys, including foam alphabet letters.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: The only thing I don't like about this is that my interior shower curtain liner ...
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I don't like about this is that my interior shower curtain liner can't close all the way, but I LOVE having my kids toys out of the way and not falling out of the corners like they were. I <3 Organization! This is simple plastic and I would imagine the dividers will break at some point, but I expect it to last for the length of time I have kids with toys in the bathtub, so that's ok. It doesn't need to last for generations.
customer_reviews.author: M. Fey

customer_reviews.title: Happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: Really like this caddy. Couldn't use a the suction type with our textured tile walls this one serves it purpose. Slides to fit the width of your bath tub and stays put.
customer_reviews.author: ShelbyAM

customer_reviews.title: Perfect solution to hold bath toys
customer_reviews.text: Perfect solution to hold bath toys! Sturdy and does the trick! This is the 3rd bath toy holder we have been through, we found that ones with suction cups just don't hold and they end up sitting on the tub floor and getting moldy. This is the perfect solution and our 2 year old uses it as a a bonus toy in the tub that his toys jump off of and swim under :) Very happy and would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jena

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!!
customer_reviews.text: This bath tub toy holder is awesome!! Easy to assemble and for a great price! You can adjust it to the desired width and works great with holding bath toys and our soaps!!
customer_reviews.author: Sydney Armstrong

customer_reviews.title: Does the job well!
customer_reviews.text: Perfectly does what it is intended to do. It is very easy to adjust and I can’t imagine it wouldn’t be able to fit a tub. We have used it several months now and it is holding up well. The design helps prevent any standing water so no issues with mold or mildew! Would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: B B

customer_reviews.title: Wish I bought it sooner!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect addition to our bath! It’s all you need to keep smaller bath toys contained and allows them to dry. My daughter likes unpacking it at the start of bath and then having somewhere to put everything at the end of hr bath. Definitely will fit most baths—size versatility is great!
customer_reviews.author: Jami S.

customer_reviews.title: Great bath toy caddy
customer_reviews.text: Great for bath toys. Water drains letting the toys dry out, big enough to hold a tub full of toys and best of all kids love putting toys away in the caddy before getting out of the tub. Stays far enough back in the tub that it’s not a problem for shower use,
customer_reviews.author: Liy

customer_reviews.title: Great item for holding all of our son's bath toys
customer_reviews.text: Great item for holding all of our son's bath toys! I like how it is adjustable so that it can be adjusted to fit most tubs. I did have two minor complaints/suggestions. I wish there was a way to lock this into place once you place it on the tub. I'm thinking about putting a zip tie between some of the holes.. that way once it is adjusted, it can be adjust again so easily. Also I've noticed some mold/mildew collects in this.. so you just have to clean it once and awhile.
customer_reviews.author: Marlene and Mark

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: This is great for bathtime. Holds a lot of toys, cups, bottles etc. Creates a great playing space while our toddler is in the tub and is not obtrusive.
customer_reviews.author: SK

customer_reviews.title: Helps a lot with bathtime
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing. Helps a lot with bathtime especially since i Can leave in bath all the time. Once in a while the whole thing falls in the water if my daughter pulls too hard but that’s to be expected.
customer_reviews.author: Kate S

customer_reviews.title: Love that it extends!
customer_reviews.text: We were struggling to find something to hold all of his bath toys and this works great and the holes all over make it easy for all the bath toys to dry
customer_reviews.author: Katrina

customer_reviews.title: Plenty of space for all the toys!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! It holds toys of many different sizes... ones that the toy scoops wouldn’t hold. I actually feel like things dry in there too! Wish I had this with our oldest was little.
customer_reviews.author: Stefanie L. Yandell

customer_reviews.title: Super space saving!
customer_reviews.text: Saves a lot of floor space. Should have bought sooner. You do need to lift shower curtain liner over it, as it will not close. But it's totally worth it. My toys drain nicely and not linger collect dust sitting in a basket on the floor.
customer_reviews.author: hwhiteman

customer_reviews.title: Great product, but the picture shown on Amazon depicted ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product, but the picture shown on Amazon depicted a basic white and blue caddy. The one we received had yellow duckies on the side handles. Not a huge deal, since our shower curtain covers it, but not exactly what was pictured. This works terrific for keeping my son's toys and shampoo bottles neatly contained, though.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for us!
customer_reviews.text: This caddy brings me back to my childhood! I had one of these and loved it. Looks so cute in our bath and holds the kids toys perfect. No more suction cups falling off the wall for us! Bonus is I can put the stuff I don't want the baby getting into on the other side of the caddy! The caddy we got is a little different then the picture, it has ducks on each side, it's actually a little cuter!
customer_reviews.author: EJ

customer_reviews.title: Great bath time caddy
customer_reviews.text: Our son has all his items in our guess bath and I wanted organization without having to take everything out after bath time. This is perfect, adjustable in size and has ample room for not only toys but all his shampoos.
customer_reviews.author: Azia M.

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased!
customer_reviews.text: I am so pleased that I found this. I use it for my hair and shower products. It holds everything I need for showering. There are even two separators that you can insert to create compartments.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy P

customer_reviews.title: Great for storage of toys.
customer_reviews.text: This is great! My kids have so much bath toys. This makes it easier for them to put their toys in. They used to have one of those bags that stuck to the side, it got moldy pretty bad, so I thought this would be easier to clean.
customer_reviews.author: boggydawggy

customer_reviews.title: Wish I had this a long time ago
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to buy this because of the price but I'm glad I did. Every suction toy holder I have bought, just falls off constantly. Thank you for making this,Munchkin!
customer_reviews.author: Haley Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: There are some other ones similar that are cheaper but I promise this one is worth it! It is great quality, easy to adjust, and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: EmalieAnn Allen

customer_reviews.title: Love that it goes across the tub
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for! Love that it goes across the tub. Allows the water to drain dry. Keeping the toys out of the water unless she grabs them with her. And it is easily adjusted and solid feeling. I love that it’s plastic and not a net suctioned to my shower wall.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect solution
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what we needed to hold our bath toys. Most of the holders with suction cups would eventually fall, and it always seemed to happen at 2 AM. Adequate hour to make us jump up from our sleep. The holes in it let the toys drain properly as well.
customer_reviews.author: Kara

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok.
customer_reviews.text: Works great in our bath. Wish it locked into a position but it slides to adjust. Ok but when it moves a bit to a smaller are of tub it will fall off. Have to be careful not to move it. Ok for older kid.
customer_reviews.author: Chris and Trish

customer_reviews.title: love it. got it for my 97 yr old ...
customer_reviews.text: love it. got it for my 97 yr old mom who uses an over the tub shower chair. was worried it would keep her from getting in the tub easily, but it didn't. she loves it too. makes it easier for her to get to soap, shampoo, bath glove. even gives her a place to set down her hand held shower sprayer while she washes her hair in shower. definitely recommend to everyone. very adjustable seems well made, easily cleaned, fairly inexpensive.
customer_reviews.author: crafty

customer_reviews.title: Great Munchkin bathtub holder.
customer_reviews.text: The shelf adjusts to the width of the tub, so it can extend quiet a bit more from the view shown. We have a "baby tub" that is smaller then standard adult size where we use this in and it hangs perfect. Since we got this my toddler is having lots of fun sorting and putting her bath toys in there. They are never more then an arms length away.
customer_reviews.author: Steven G.Top Contributor: Lego

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice, great fit
customer_reviews.text: This fits great in our tub. We have a large deep tub and this is great to keep all of the baby bath stuff neat and organized.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Holds a ton of bath toys, drains well, easy to clean, adjustable to fit our odd size tub. My 3 year old is ROUGH and has been playing with it in the tub (she made it into a bridge/drum/slide) but it is holding up. Will transition well as kids get older. We've had it a few months and so far no mold. I love that I don't have the hard water build up around suction cups and that I don't have to find a place to move it out of the way to use the shower.
customer_reviews.author: Becky Bott

customer_reviews.title: I am happy with this bath caddy
customer_reviews.text: I am happy with this bath caddy. It is a good size, looks nice and feels sturdy. I would like to add that I received a slightly different version. Everything is the same except the blue parts are lighter and there are ducks on the handles on mine. I am not sure if this is the newer version. I don't have a problem with it being slightly different but some of you might want exactly how it is pictured.
customer_reviews.author: Nepu

customer_reviews.title: I love love this
customer_reviews.text: I love love this!!! My husband gave me a hard time for buying another thing for our son. After a few months of having it, he says it was a really good buy. It is nice to have the toys out of the way and our son can just grab what he wants.
customer_reviews.author: Sb

customer_reviews.title: 2year old daughter approved
customer_reviews.text: This piece can be wet all day. It holds a good amount of toys. It expands to fit multiple size bath tubs. I really like it and my daughter likes the ducks on it.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby

customer_reviews.title: Great tub caddy
customer_reviews.text: My daughter and I both love this caddy. It's very durable and easy to clean
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth it
customer_reviews.text: Got to many bath toys? I know my son does. It actually fits in this and makes my life easy.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle C.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent bath organizer & caddy
customer_reviews.text: Excellent bath caddy! I had to get a new bath organizer since I discovered our new bathroom tiles wouldn't support any suction cup type of hanging organizers. So this has worked great to keep the toys out of the tub and easily collect toys & remove from the tub when we have guests over.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Labbe

customer_reviews.title: Cute bath product
customer_reviews.text: Very cute and effective. Does not hold too many toys though. Unfortunately does not work the best for our tub, because one side is a wall. You need a lip on each side to have it fit properly.
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Caddy
customer_reviews.text: I am sending back. Did not fit my tub right I was looking for something to put toys in but not made for that
customer_reviews.author: wdavis

customer_reviews.title: Great Organizer
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something to keep my kids bath toys from being all over the place. This works perfectly! Skinny enough that it can stay in place and not disturb showering yet big enough it fits all of their bath toys. The best part, I don’t have to deal with suction cups!
customer_reviews.author: Holly Darby

customer_reviews.title: Best bath storage ever
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had brought this as soon as my toddler started having baths in the big tub. It keeps everything out of the way and off the floor, and you can just slide it to one end of an adult is bathing or showering. I put this on my recommended must-have list for new moms.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Sorensen

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT FOR OUR USE
customer_reviews.text: My sister had a stoke several months ago and now depends on a shower chair to bathe. This is PERFECT for her. She can have all her bathing products right in front of her and in easy reach. When she's done her husband just sets it at the back of the tub out of the way for his showers. Very sturdy, a great product.
customer_reviews.author: PJ

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Sturdy and well made for the price. My daughter likes to pour water on her toys in it (instead of spilling it on the side of the tub) and I like that it keeps her toy organized
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for bath toys
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. Does exactly what is says. We use this for our toddler's bath toys. We do not have a large rim around our tub but the works great. It allows the toys to drain and dry. The blue "walls" are movable and make it great for standing up soap bottles in one section and putting toys in the other. It is easy to clean, too.
customer_reviews.author: alross

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for our shower/bath to hold the kiddos toys in and to keep them out of the way. For what it is it absolutely does that. The only thing I've found is that you've got to clean it out very periodically to avoid any mold or gunk from building up at the bottom. Other than that, great purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome! We have a weirdly shaped tub and none ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! We have a weirdly shaped tub and none of the other toy containers would work for us. This actually holds a fair amount of smaller toys. We have it pushed to the very back of the tub so more toys can be stacked up without losing them. We don't use the soap holder bc it is slightly ackward placement (down around your knees), and the kids don't need to have access to the soap.
customer_reviews.author: nicspa19

customer_reviews.title: adorable!
customer_reviews.text: I love this separator! Its adorable with the colors. the quality is very good. I use it to keep my toddler from reaching the water lever. works wonderfully!
customer_reviews.author: c.c

customer_reviews.title: Best Toy Storage Ever
customer_reviews.text: I used a popular brand's bath toy storage that suctions to the bath wall, but it would always fall. This toy storage is the best ever! I love that it is plastic and has holes so there's no worry about mold or mildew. I would buy this for any mom with little ones!
customer_reviews.author: Cher

customer_reviews.title: Great for small spaces
customer_reviews.text: I live in a small apartment but have lots of stuff. I have a shower hanging caddy already but I still needed extra space for my many shower products.. this is great to store things.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this idea!!!! Works great for my toddler who not only likes to clean but was also getting scared that her toys would be going down the drain. Now they're out of the way and it's easy enough for her to clean up after herself when her bath is done. My only complaint is the shower curtain liner can't really fit with this in the way. Not a huge deal.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Love the product. Easy to assemble and seems sturdy. I just don’t allow my daughter to use it as support system to stand up. Love how you can customize the product to your needs and that it has compartments.
customer_reviews.author: Irene

customer_reviews.title: It holds a lot of bath toys.
customer_reviews.text: I love this to keep toys in the bathtub. It holds a good bit of stuff and I like that I can put it all the way at the foot end of the tub where it is not in my way. My granddaughter loves it. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfect over the tub and is adjustable. Holds lots of toys and I like the soap attachment. Can also hang the wash bucket from the side.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Perfect tray
customer_reviews.text: Love this product !!!!!! Perfect to keep all of babies stuff organizer and just very handy. Can fit a very large bath tub or the smallest bath tub!
customer_reviews.author: KailaN

customer_reviews.title: Item not exactly as pictured, but works well.
customer_reviews.text: The set up is very nice. The only reason we're not giving it 5 stars is due to the fact that the picture shows blue rubber grips on the ends, but when it came it had yellow ducks instead.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

product_meta.title: Munchkin Quack Bath Caddy
product_meta.description: Do you feel like your tub has been taken over by your little squirt's toys? Keep bath essentials within reach and clutter at bay with Munchkin's Quack Bath Caddy. This handy caddy extends across the tub with Xtra Grip handles for added stability. The caddy holds toys at your child's level so they can grab what they want and even help clean up when bath time is over. Adjustable dividers allow you to customize storage for toys and shampoo. And as an added (major!) bonus, place the caddy between your little one and the bathtub spout to help protect against bumps and burns. When bath time is over, just slide the caddy to the back of the tub so it's out of the way for showers. With multiple drain holes, everything will dry quickly, helping prevent mildew. Safety and organization: exactly what you need for smooth sailing during the bathtime routine.
feature_bullets: Organize toys and bath essentials while keeping baby safe from the bathtub spout
Caddy sides extend to fit across tub (up to 31.25 inch)
Extra Grip handles keep caddy secure on tub ledge; no suction cups needed
Includes 2 customizable dividers and 1 soap dish with washcloth hook
Drain holes allow for quick drying, helping prevent mildew in bath toys

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars853 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
